mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM qdsProduct AS p WHERE p.moduleNo LIKE CONCAT (#{moduleNo},'%') AND p.qdsProCategoryId=(SELECT id FROM qdsProCategory WHERE qdsProCategoryName=#{qdsProCategoryName});

SELECT *,(select c.qdsProCategoryName from qdsProCategory c where c.id=p.qdsProCategoryId) as qdsProCategoryName, (select o.order from qdsProductOrder o where o.id=p.qdsProductOrderId) as `order` FROM qdsProduct p WHERE 1=1 and p.moduleNo like concat ('%',#{moduleNo},'%') order by id desc limit #{beginNo},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from qdsProduct p where 1=1 and p.moduleNo like concat ('%',#{moduleNo},'%')
mapper.update: update qdsProduct set assyStatus=#{assyStatus} where moduleNo=#{moduleNo}
